title: Flipkart service center return policy scam 2023
selftext:
Dear users

Be careful with #flipkart service center return policy scam. With this policy Flipkart delivering damaged products( September 30 I have ordered Onida washing machine it was delivered on 2nd October 2023 technician was visited on 3Rd October and he said it was defective. At that time I have connected with Flipkart team said its understand service center return policy connect with service center here
1) invoice is generated with Flipkart 
2) amount paid to Flipkart 
3) item defective delivered through Flipkart
If problem occurs we have to connect with service center is there any logic even legal notice also not responding. In india Flipkart managing law as well Flipkart don't have respect on Indian law as well
